results.title: Aladdin
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Ron Clements, John Musker, Roger Allers, Kevin Lima, Darrell Rooney, Burny Mattinson, Chris Sanders, Brian Pimental, Francis Glebas, Larry Leker, Kevin Harkey, Patrick A. Ventura, Rebecca Reese, Daan Jippes, James Fujii, David S. Smith, Sue C. Nichols, Ted Elliott and Terry Rossio
results.brief_description: Princess Jasmine grows tired of being forced to remain in the palace, so she sneaks out into the marketplace, in disguise, where she meets street-urchin Aladdin. The couple falls in love, although Jasmine may only marry a prince. After being thrown in jail, Aladdin becomes embroiled in a plot to find a mysterious lamp, with which the evil Jafar hopes to rule the land.

constellations_other.name: Cautionary tales and magic lantern projectors
constellations_other.description: Early magic lantern projections depicted cautionary religious scenes and fairytales, just like cinema did in its infancy.

constellations_other.name: Bell & Howell Projector 621: This picture has been edited for content
constellations_other.description: The Bell & Howell-Gaumont Model 621 projector was originally used entertain the shearers on a sheep farm in South Australia with the films screened sometimes edited for distribution.

Ventura, Rebecca Reese, Daan Jippes, James Fujii, David S. Smith, Sue C. Nichols, Ted Elliott and Terry Rossio

After being thrown in jail, Aladdin becomes embroiled in a plot to find a mysterious lamp, with which the evil Jafar hopes to rule the land.

results.title: Akira
results.creator_credit: Akira Committee Company Ltd., Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS), Sumitomo Corporation, Toho Company, Ltd., Studio Fuga, Studio Aoi, TMS Entertainment, Kodansha, Bandai Entertainment Inc., Katsuhiro Otomo, Kazuo Ebisawa, Yuji Ikehata, Koji Ono, Izo Hashimoto, Haruyo Kanesaku, Shunzo Kato, Yutaka Maseba, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Hiroe Tsukamoto and Ry√¥hei Suzuki
results.brief_description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Akira Committee Company Ltd., Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS), Sumitomo Corporation, Toho Company, Ltd., Studio Fuga, Studio Aoi, TMS Entertainment, Kodansha, Bandai Entertainment Inc., Katsuhiro Otomo, Kazuo Ebisawa, Yuji Ikehata, Koji Ono, Izo Hashimoto, Haruyo Kanesaku, Shunzo Kato, Yutaka Maseba, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Hiroe Tsukamoto and Ry√¥hei Suzuki

results.title: Airplane!
results.brief_description: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane.

constellations_other.name: Atari‚Äôs Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari‚Äôs Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

results.description: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane with the help of a glue-sniffing air traffic controller and Striker’s vengeful former Air Force captain, who must both talk him down.
description_for_label: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane with the help of a glue-sniffing air traffic controller and Striker’s vengeful former Air Force captain, who must both talk him down.

results.title: Ai Weiwei: Never Sorry
results.brief_description: Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai Wei Wei‚Äôs life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake.

constellations_other.name: The Family Law
constellations_other.description: An exploration of Asian representation on screens around the world that delves into TV, cinema, documentaries and Disney princesses.

results.description: Ai Weiwei is known for many things ‚Äì great architecture, subversive in-your-face art, and political activism. He has also called for greater transparency on the part of the Chinese state. Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai‚Äôs life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake. The record continues through his widely publicized arrest in Beijing in April of 2011. As Ai prepares various works of art for major international exhibitions, his activism heats up, and his run-ins with China‚Äôs authorities become more and more frequent.
description_for_label: Ai Weiwei is known for many things ‚Äì great architecture, subversive in-your-face art, and political activism. He has also called for greater transparency on the part of the Chinese state. Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai‚Äôs life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake. The record continues through his widely publicized arrest in Beijing in April of 2011. As Ai prepares various works of art for major international exhibitions, his activism heats up, and his run-ins with China‚Äôs authorities become more and more frequent.

results.title: Across the Universe
results.creator_credit: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
results.brief_description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
results.description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, a rich but sheltered American girl who joins the growing anti-war movement in New York’s Greenwich Village. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
description_for_label: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, a rich but sheltered American girl who joins the growing anti-war movement in New York’s Greenwich Village. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.

results.title: Ac!d Reign Chronicles
results.brief_description: A series of seven music videos created by musicians Grimes and Hana while on their Ac!d Reign tour, all of which were recorded using iPhones.

constellations_other.name: A handheld aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Looking at the use of handycams and other consumer level devices in moving image works.

results.description: A series of seven music videos created by musicians Grimes and Hana while on their Ac!d Reign tour, all of which were recorded using iPhones.

results.title: Abra Cadabra
results.brief_description: Dr Cadabra, an eccentric magician, lives in outer space with his son Abra and their pets - Stella the star cat and Zodiac the space dog. When all four are busy elsewhere, two villains, B.L. Z’Bub and Klaw the Rat King, take off with the Cosmic pipe.
results.description: Dr Cadabra, an eccentric magician, lives in outer space with his son Abra and their pets - Stella the star cat and Zodiac the space dog. When all four are busy elsewhere, two villains, B.L. Z’Bub and Klaw the Rat King, take off with the Cosmic pipe.

results.title: A Visit to the Seaside
results.brief_description: The first successful motion picture in the Kinemacolor system, this eight minute short from George Albert Smith showed people in Brighton, England doing everyday activities. Kinemacolor later influenced and was then replaced by Technicolor.

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

results.description: The first successful motion picture in the Kinemacolor system, this eight minute short from George Albert Smith showed people in Brighton, England doing everyday activities. Kinemacolor later influenced and was then replaced by Technicolor.
description_for_label: The first successful motion picture in the Kinemacolor system, this eight minute short from George Albert Smith showed people in Brighton, England doing everyday activities. Kinemacolor later influenced and was then replaced by Technicolor.

results.title: A United Kingdom
results.brief_description: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments.

constellations_other.name: Royals
constellations_other.description: Royal watchers don't need to visit palaces around the world. There are enough stories about royalty on the silver and small screen to get their fix.

results.description: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments. Seretse and Ruth defied family, Apartheid and empire - their love triumphed over every obstacle flung in their path and in so doing they transformed their nation and inspired the world.
description_for_label: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments. Seretse and Ruth defied family, Apartheid and empire - their love triumphed over every obstacle flung in their path and in so doing they transformed their nation and inspired the world.

results.title: A Trip to the Moon
results.brief_description: A group of men travel to the moon by being shot in a capsule from a giant cannon. They are captured by moon-men, escape, and return to the earth. The film was the first film with a self-contained plot and was the beginning of the science fiction genre.

constellations_other.name: Innovation, technology and design: Edweard Muybridge
constellations_other.description: A focus on the discovery, inspiration and innovation at the heart of moving image history

results.description: A group of men travel to the moon by being shot in a capsule from a giant cannon. They are captured by moon-men, escape, and return to the earth. The film was the first film with a self-contained plot and was the beginning of the science fiction genre.
